General.Name: Shareholder Value Beteiligungen AG
General.Description: Shareholder Value Beteiligungen AG engages in investing funds primarily in listed stock corporations. The company invests in small and medium-sized companies in German-speaking countries. Shareholder Value Beteiligungen AG was founded in 2000 and is based in Frankfurt, Germany.
General.Address: Neue Mainzer Strasse 1, Frankfurt am Main, Germany, 60311
